{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amazon |model=Fire TV |revision=Cube (EX69VW) |asin=B01NBTFNVA |price=120 |est_release_date=06/21/2018 |fcc_date=06/07/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=media streamer |fcc_id=2AJZB-0308 |pcb_id=30-002759 |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905Z |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=SanDisk |fla1_model=SDIN8DE4-16G |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4A8G165WB-BCRC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (Female Micro-B), |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=false |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=Bluetooth 4.2 LE, Alexa, HDMI out, 4K, IR transmitter, DFS (slave), |stock_os=Android;7.1;Fire OS 6; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} Like previous Amazon devices, this device was filed as a "Digital Media
Streaming Device" under a grantee code of a random LLC (''Verdegrass LLC''). {{FCC ST|12/04/2018|indexme.}} âš  ===Teardowns=== * [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Amazon+Fire+TV+Cube+Teardown/110982 ''Amazon Fire TV Cube Teardown'' (Video) on '''iFixit'''] : "30-002759 REV 01" is silkscreened on the board. ===Device specifications=== * [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/fire-tv/device-specifications.html?v=ftvcube ''Device Specifications for Fire TV'' on '''Amazon'''] ===See also=== *[[Amazon Fire TV Devices]] __NOTOC__
